title: The Children of Eden: Sequel to Idle, Wild, Love
description: Clover, Grove, and Violet lost their mother, Eden, a year ago. They all proceed on a difficult journey of trying to handle their grief, until each of them receives a mysterious letter in the mail from their deceased mother. These letters send them on a journey through the past to understand the beauty of life, love, and family.  The Children of Eden is a must read for those who fell in love with the Carrington family in Idle, Wild, Love.
author: Shaida Escoffery
